name: PACHACAMAC  (The Inca Oracle City) & BARRANCO (The Bohemian District)
description:
This Trip will combine visiting the Pre Inca Oracle City of Pachacamac situated at the south of Lima with 17 pyramids and visiting the bohemian district were most of our local artist live (Nobel Price Winner Mario Vargas Llosa lives there) and taste what attract`s them to live there.
We could either have lunch on Pachacamac or Barranco because there are lots of tasteful places depending on what you like and what you eat.
